title: LISTEN NOW: Vanessa Sierra dumped and Matt Zukowski's 'fake' tears on reality TV podcast Obsessed!
text:
The Monday night 'dumping' of controversial Love Island Australia contestant Vanessa Sierra is the focus of the latest episode of reality TV podcast Obsessed!

Fans of the reality show were divided by the double elimination ceremony, with many questioning whether Vanessa had orchestrated her relationship with partner Matt Zukowski in order to win the competition.

But Obsessed! host Crystal Andrews said Vanessa had been held to an unfair standard by fellow contestants.

Listen to the full episode:

DUMPED: Public opinion is split over the elimination of controversial contestant Love Island Australia contestant Vanessa Sierra from on Monday night

'[Matt] did not appear to stand up for her once.'

'She had every right to be upset about that and questioning how genuine he was, if he wasn't going to stick up for her once in all of the trash that was being smeared about her all over the island.'

'For her to be held to the same standard about not weighing in on anyone else's relationship… I couldn't believe the Islanders couldn't see their own hypocrisy.'

Co-host Josh Moss, a popular contestant from the 2018 season of Love Island Australia, also questioned the authenticity of Matt's emotional reaction.

Crocodile tears? Matt Zukowski was openly emotional after the elimination ceremony, despite having his own concerns over his reality TV romance with Vanessa

At the announcement of Vanessa's elimination, the 24-year-old part-time wrestler burst into tears that quickly disappeared once he realised he did not have to leave the competition alongside his former partner.

'That's rubbing salt into the wound,' Josh said.

'Vanessa's there feeling so average about herself, and you're smiling and cheering because you're saved from being dumped. It looked like he was more stoked to still be in the villa.'

Listen to the every episode of Obsessed! the podcast here.
description: The Monday night 'dumping' of Love Island Australia's Vanessa Sierra is the focus of the latest episode of reality TV podcast Obsessed!
